column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The service and lack of variety kind of blend together in my experience. Like I said before
column2: my friend and I weren't really in the mood for anything sweet
column3: so we were evaluating our options in front of one of the staff members behind the counter. I pointed out the savory scone
column4: and we thought about it for a little bit before asking the staff member what her suggestions were for a more savory option. She just said
column5: "well there's the savory scone." Lol. She probably didn't mean it rudely but it kinda came off condescendingly
column6: and also we were surprised that they didn't have quiche or any other traditional savory pastry besides the scone and the bialy.
